subject: Missing package
description_text:
Hello Simsonn,

I ordered a set of the Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor with my pedals around
the beginning of September. The order number is #SSN2550 received the
pedals within a week of ordering but I have not received the motors yet. I
was wondering where this package is or how I should go about replacing them
if the package was lost

Thanks,
Ben

conversations.body_text: Hi supalox 14,    We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused. We have noted that your parcel has indeed been delayed, and it is highly probable that it has been lost. We have arranged for a replacement to be sent to you. Here is your new tracking number: 394270940572  https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=394270940572
